description: Impose a +4K warming pattern anomaly to the amip SST.  The SST pattern anomaly is derived from years 91-140 of the model's own abrupt4xCO2 experiment, with respect to the piControl, and scaled to have a global mean increase of 4K. The SST pattern anomaly is to be expressed as seasonally varying monthly means.
name: amip SST plus patterned 4K derived from 4xCO2 monthly varying SST anomalies
longName: amip sea surface temperature patterned 4K increase derived from the 4xCO2 monthly varying sea surface temperature anomalies.
keywords: patterned SST warming, amip,  4K, 4xCO2, seasonally varying monthly means.
